hero.subtitle: AI Developer
hero.title: Hi, I'm
hero.name: Amirhossein Keramati
hero.description: AI Developer. Focused on Machine Learning, Deep Learning, and AI Agents.

skills.title: Expertise
skills.heading: Technical
skills.description: A set of technical skills developed through years of continuous learning and hands on experience.

items.award2_desc: Participated in the Salman Technology Festival as the only student team among university and professional teams. This achievement reflects a high level of technical ability at a young age.
items.award1_desc: Our team achieved first place at the Hamtatech Exhibition (the first exhibition of SAMPAD Amir Kabir students' achievements) with 11 projects.
items.award3_desc: Third place in the National Autonomous Car Competition of Iran Research Centers in 2024 to 2025. Developed advanced PID control algorithm and color path image processing. I was responsible for algorithm design, programming, and full system implementation.
items.award4_desc: Student at SAMPAD Amir Kabir Technical High School, one of the country's most prestigious technical schools, while working on real world artificial intelligence projects.
items.award5_desc: First place in the Khwarizmi Youth Festival provincial stage in the applied software development category. Designed a Windows based educational language learning application called 'Kalame Dan' using Python and a CustomTkinter interface.

about.title: About Me
about.heading: Passionate About
paragraphs: I am an AI developer and AI agents enthusiast. My journey started with electronics and Arduino, and later evolved toward  artificial intelligence.

Currently, I focus on developing AI solutions. My main work areas include AI agents, natural language processing, and language model based systems. My activity is mainly centered on designing and implementing intelligent software solutions.
Alongside programming, I participated in the national autonomous car competition and achieved third place. I have also been actively involved in technology exhibitions.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.heading: Let's
contact.description: Have a project in mind or want to collaborate? I'd love to hear from you. Drop me a message and let's create something amazing together.

availability.title: Available for work
availability.text: Currently open to freelance projects, full-time opportunities, and collaborations. Response time: within 24 hours.
